code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./Background.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Background=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const gradients=document.querySelectorAll('.gradient');gradients.forEach(gradient=>{const vw=window.innerWidth;const vh=window.innerHeight;const randomStartX=Math.random()*vw;const randomStartY=Math.random()*vh;const randomEndX=Math.random()*vw;const randomEndY=Math.random()*vh;gradient.style.setProperty('--start-x',"".concat(randomStartX,"px"));gradient.style.setProperty('--start-y',"".concat(randomStartY,"px"));gradient.style.setProperty('--end-x',"".concat(randomEndX,"px"));gradient.style.setProperty('--end-y',"".concat(randomEndY,"px"));});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bgStick background-site",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gradient",id:"gradient0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gradient",id:"gradient1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gradient",id:"gradient2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gradient",id:"gradient3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gradient",id:"gradient4"})]})});};export default Background;
